            "acl_action": 1,
            "match": {
                "ip_rule": {
                    "ip": {
                        "destination_network": "fd30:0000:0000:0001:000e:0000:0000:0000/64",
                        "source_network": "fd30:0000:0000:0001:000e:0000:0000:0000/64"
                    },
                    "udp": {
                        "destination_port_range": {
                            "lower_port": 80,
                            "upper_port": 1000
                        },
                        "source_port_range": {
                            "lower_port": 10,
                            "upper_port": 2000
                        },
                        "tcp_flags_mask": 20,
                        "tcp_flags_value": 10
                    }
                }
            }
        }
